head.title: Generate charts in {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: The {{ProdFullName}} API allows developers to create and insert dynamic charts or graphs into documents seamlessly, powered by live data.

header.title: Add charts to {{FileFormatUp}} documents with {{EnvNameShort}} API
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies the process of embedding charts into {{FileFormatUp}} documents by utilizing real-time data.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Introduction to {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a versatile solution for automating the creation of documents and reports. It enables you to add charts, tables, lists, barcodes, and images directly into your files, with advanced tools for precise formatting and data integration. The platform supports over 50 formats, including PDF, Microsoft Office files, and emails.

more_features.title: Effortlessly embed dynamic charts in your documents
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides an easy way to build data-rich documents in popular formats. Use templates to insert charts, tables, barcodes, lists, links, and images with dynamic updates from your data.

feature_1.title: Easily turn data into charts
feature_1.content: Use the API to transform data from JSON, XML, CSV, or other sources into clean, professional charts for your documents.

feature_2.title: Create visually impactful content
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} supports various visual formats, including bar graphs, pie charts, and line graphs, which can be combined with tables, barcodes, images, and more for enhanced reports.

feature_3.title: Customizable chart placement and styling
feature_3.content: With LINQ-based syntax, you can dynamically generate and position charts in the document, while easily adjusting styles, colors, and layouts to meet your design needs.

feature_4.title: Supports multiple document formats
feature_4.content: Generate documents in formats like MS Office, PDF, OpenOffice, and HTML. The charts integrate smoothly into any supported format for professional results.

formats.title: Generate comprehensive reports in diverse formats
formats.description: {{EnvName}} lets you create documents with integrated charts across over 50 file formats, ensuring seamless merging of templates and data.

operations.title: Explore powerful capabilities
operations.description: This platform simplifies the process of designing data-focused, visually appealing documents tailored to your needs.

examples.comment_2: Provide the file path to your template
examples.comment_3: Extract the necessary data from your source
examples.comment_4: Save the final document with the embedded chart

steps.title: Steps to embed a chart into a {{FileFormatUp}} document

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) simplifies the process of inserting charts into {{FileFormatUp}} templates. Choose from a variety of chart styles, including bar, pie, and line charts.
content.step_1: Create a {{FileFormatUp}} template with placeholders for the chart.
content.step_2: Load your data from a compatible source.
content.step_3: Set the chart options, such as type, labels, and colors.
content.step_4: Save the document with the chart included.

code_1.title: Programmatically generate and embed charts
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to create and embed a chart into a {{FileFormatUp}} document programmatically.
code_1.comment_1: Prepare a template with a placeholder for the chart
code_1.comment_2: Specify the file path to the template
code_1.comment_3: Load data from your chosen source
code_1.comment_4: Create a data object with the relevant information
code_1.comment_5: Configure the chart's type and appearance
code_1.comment_7: Save the completed document with the chart embedded
